column4: I need a hand setting up mp3's to play, i know this si a common question but everything I've tried doesnt work.
What is it doing?
It says "The file is not an audio stream"
sudu apt-get install xmms
did that do it for you?
That did not work, it said the package has no installation candidate. It's not connected to the net btw.
ok so look in you System > Administration > synaptic... load that up and search for mpg123
it didn't find anything
you said it is not connected to the internet?...
no internet connection
give me a few
Ok, thanks
see if you can find mpg321
Nope, I had a look and theres nothing starting with mpg. Also I'm using Breezy Badger if that makes a difference.
try gstreamer0.8-mad
Theres no mad plugin there.
well... because there is not internet connection to the box it is going to take a bit.
Heh, I figured that much. I've only got wireless broadband and I can't get that going either.
If it's going to be to much trouble I'll work on my connection first, as I need that aswell. Thankyou for the help!
well, do a google search for mpg321 on the box you are using and download it, you may have to manually download and install the dependencies too
That's probably what I've been trying to do up until now. I've only just started with Linux so I get stuck with the installing bit.
yes to access the universe you will have to be online
